name: Harold the Hermit Crab
description:
Travel through gardens to help Harold find his true home. Harold must inhabit different objects to help him reach his goal.

CONTROLS: 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

SPACE BAR -Swap to a nearby shell

CREDITS:

Created by Kasandra Hansen & Rory O'Dwyer, made within 72 hours for Global Game Jam 2019 at Falmouth University's Games Academy.

Art - Kasandra Hansen

Programming/UI - Rory O'Dwyer

Character Animation - Rob Fitzpatrick

Grass & Lighting - Sean-Kee Murmann
